all_the_buzz.entities.record_entities module

class all_the_buzz.entities.record_entities.BaseRecord(id=None, ref_id=None, is_edit=None, language='english')

Bases: ABC

Abstract record entity class. All other classes inherit from it. This class includes all shared fields and methods include id, ref_id, is_edit, and language.

abstractmethod static from_json_object(content)
hexadecimal_test(s)

Method for validating a string is hexadecimal.This will be used for validating mongodb ids.

Parameters:

s – a string

Returns:

True if s is hexadecimal False if s is not hexadecimal

Exceptions:

ValueError: String is not hexadecimal

class all_the_buzz.entities.record_entities.Bio(id=None, ref_id=None, is_edit=None, language='English', birth_year=1900, death_year=2020, name='Bob Lastname', paragraph='Bio stuff', summary='summary', source_url='https://fake-url.com')

Bases: BaseRecord

Validates bios record data passed to it. This class includes id, ref_id, is_edit, birth_year, death_year, paragraph, summary, source_url, language.

To initilize this class, the from_json_object method can be used.

The fields: ‘name’,’paragraph’,’language’,’source_url’ are all required.

class all_the_buzz.entities.record_entities.Joke(id=None, ref_id=None, is_edit=None, difficulty=1, content={'text': 'Haha', 'type': 'one_liner'}, explanation='', language='english')

To initilize this class, the from_json_object method can be used.
